author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Fortnite's new season features plenty of the usual cross-IP cameos (like the Power Rangers), but also new enemies in the form of giant bugs. Sound familiar? Developer Arrowhead thinks so. Calling the new Fortnite mode, "Helldivers at home," Arrowhead also tossed some praise toward the ever-popular battle royale, recognizing it as the 'king of video game drip.' In other news, McDonald's in Japan recently ran a promotional offer for free limited edition Pokémon cards with the purchase of select McDonald's meals. The offer quickly got out of hand as countless food items went uneaten as fans and scalpers bought meals just to get the cards, and discarded the food itself. After running out of cards in about a day, McDonald's Japan cut the promo short and apologized to those who never even had a chance to get one of the cards. And learn all about Borderlands 4's newest vault hunter: Vex the Siren.

Presented by Borderlands 4.
title: Helldivers Devs Throw Shade and Praise at Fortnite Bug Season - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Will tearing apart the legion of evildoers be as joyful during hour six as it is during this glorious prelude? It's tough to say for sure. But if nothing else, the '90s-themed arcade-style brawler Marvel Cosmic Invasion makes an indelible first impression. Previewed by Jeremy Smith
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Is Exactly What ‘90s Kids Want it To Be

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza has dozens of fossils to collect in every level, and we’re digging through the sands of the world to uncover them all! In this video we’ll be going over every fossil location in the Resort Layer. If you need help finding any of the 30 common fossils found in this level, this guide will show you where to find them all so you can purchase different colored outfits for DK!

What You'll Find in This Video:
Exact locations for all 30 Fossils in the Resort Layer

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:27 Map view of all 30 Common Fossils
01:45 Juicy Beach area
02:34 Distant Concrete Island
02:52 Island near Juicy Beach
03:11 Tropical Retreat area
05:58 Fruitbowl Archipelago area
07:34 Tropical Retreat Outskirts area
08:34 Climbing up to the big watermelon & surrounding floating islands
09:35 Watermelon Tower area

#IGN #Gaming
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - Every Resort Layer Fossil Location

description:

#IGN
title: Some of our favorite moments from San Diego Comic-Con 2025. Presented by @OfficialChiquita #sdcc

author: IGN
description:
The Riftbreaker gets a new trailer for its forthcoming 2.0 update, which brings online co-op to the sci-fi base-building survival game with action-RPG elements. Check out this exclusive The Riftbreaker trailer featuring mechs, giant monsters, and co-op action. The Riftbreaker's 2.0 update, featuring the Co-op Mode, launches on PC, Xbox, and PlayStation on August 25, 2025. You can learn more about The Riftbreaker on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/780310/The_Riftbreaker/

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Riftbreaker - Official Update 2.0: Co-op Mode Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In partnership with ModDB, the RTX Remix Mod Contest features 23 competitors who have injected ray-traced lighting and remastered assets into some iconic games. And the best part? These talented devs have released their respective mods to the public, meaning you get to enjoy the mods for yourself, regardless of who wins!
These developers are competing in the following categories: Best Overall RTX Remix Mod, Best Use of RTX in a Mod, Most Complete RTX Mod, and Community Choice RTX Mod. Each submission is competing for a piece of the $50,000 cash prize pool with winners getting announced at this year’s gamescom. You can try all these mods out for yourself by heading over to moddb.com/remix.

Presented by NVIDIA.
title: NVIDIA RTX Remix Contest Adds Ray Tracing, DLSS, & Overhauled Assets to These PC Classics

author: IGN
description:
One of the best spots on the convention floor at Evo is always the Indie Dev Gallery, where Indie Developers show off their latest fighting games for fans to check out. Evo 2025 was an especially great showing, and while we didn't get a chance to profile all of them, here are the six games that stood out the most from the show.

author: IGN
description: Join a band of adventurers to learn more about the story of Dungeon Stalkers in this launch trailer for this upcoming PvEvP dungeon crawler game, where you can experience the joy of exploration and survival in a classic RPG. In Dungeon Stalkers, join forces with your companions to defeat other adventurers and monsters, and acquire equipment and treasures. Then, escape safely from the witch's curse. Dungeon Stalkers will be available on PC on August 12, 2025.
title: Dungeon Stalkers - Official Launch Story Trailer

author: IGN
description: At Evo 2025, we got a chance to speak with Executive Producer Mike Willette to talk all about Invincible VS, with questions ranging from whether the team would be open to a crossover with Mortal Kombat, to what it's like adapting characters from the comics into a fighting game, and much more .
title: How Invincible VS Puts Its Own Unique Mark on the Tag Fighter Genre | Evo 2025

author: IGN
description: Hop on your Digimon's back, shoulder, cockpit, wheels, and more as you explore Digital World, Iliad, in this new Digimon Story Time Stranger trailer for the upcoming turn-based RPG. Get ready to travel across time and parallel worlds when Digimon Story Time Stranger launches on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on October 3, 2025.
title: Digimon Story Time Stranger - Official DigiRide Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A young boy’s night terrors become reality when his mother begins showing signs of demonic possession. What he’s about to experience will haunt him for the rest of his life and claim countless lives across generations. 

The film stars Rebekah Kennedy, Ranen Navat, Sean O’Bryan, Susan Gayle Watts, Emily Goss, AJ Bowen, and Sean Whalen. Director Pierre Tsigaridis' Traumatika opens in theaters via Saban Films on September 12, 2025.

#IGN #Traumatika #Horror
title: Traumatika Exclusive Trailer (2025) Rebekah Kennedy, Ranen Navat, Susan Gayle Watts

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Woochi the Wayfarer, an upcoming Korean action-adventure game developed by Nexon Games. Players will explore a fantasy world during Korea’s Joseon era as the Dosa named Jeon Woochi, the Mage of the Way. Make use of the formidable powers and abilities to fight back against injustice and trick the corrupt for good, among traditional music and monsters from Korean mythology. Woochi the Wayfarer is coming soon to consoles and PC.
title: Woochi the Wayfarer - Official Reveal Trailer (Korean Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Enhanced Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition, an upcoming remaster of the classic real-time strategy game developed by Relic Entertainment. Players will be able to experience the legendary title with enhancements for the modern era. The game is packed with the base game, including all of the expansions, coupled with enhanced visuals, 4K support, pathfinding improvements, and more. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition is launching on August 14 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition - Official Cinematic Enhanced Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Deadzone: Rogue version 1.0 is available now on Steam. Get another look at gameplay, terrifying enemies you'll fight, upgrades, and weapons you'll use in this exclusive, action-packed Deadzone: Rogue launch trailer for the roguelite FPS set in space. A demo for Deadzone: Rogue is also out now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S.

In DeadZone: Rogue, blast through hordes of enemies with devastating weapons. Define your combat style with powerful augments and upgrades. Grow stronger with each death, solo or in co-op. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat.

#DeadzoneRogue #Gaming #IGN
title: Deadzone: Rogue - Official Version 1.0 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Peak's Mesa update is out now on Steam. Watch the latest Peak trailer to see what you can expect with the Mesa Update, which brings a new biome to the co-op platformer game. In the Peak: Mesa update, explore the sandy terrain under the blistering sun. There are plenty of areas to find shade, and quite a few mysteries lie within...

#Peak #Gaming #IGN
title: Peak: The Mesa Update - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In the lawless frontier of 1849, a deadly sickness spreads — and with it, rumors of a young girl cursed by the devil. One man must choose whether to run, or stand and protect the innocent. 

The western-thriller stars Guy Pearce, DeWanda Wise, Bill Pullman, Raoul Trujillo, Jaime Neumann, Jack Alcott, Joanna Cassidy, and Emily Ford.

Writer-director Ned Crowley's Killing Faith will be distributed by Shout! Studios on October 3, 2025.

#ign #KillingFaithMovie
title: Killing Faith Exclusive Trailer (2025) Guy Pearce, DeWanda Wise, Bill Pullman

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the August Demo Trailer for Star Fire: Eternal Cycle, a side-scrolling arcade action roguelike developed by Ethereal Fish Studio. 

Players will dispatch waves of enemies wielding a selection of dynamic elemental weapons with distinct combat styles from frozen wastelands to scorching deserts. Acquire upgrades and abilities in Star Fire: Eternal Cycle, coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.

#IGN #StarFire #BeatEmUp
title: Star Fire: Eternal Cycle - Official August Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at Cahaya’s two islands in this new Inzoi trailer for the upcoming free Island Getaway DLC for the life simulation game. Inzoi: Island Getaway will be available on Steam and the Mac App Store on August 20, 2025.

#IGN #Inzoi #DLC
title: inZOI - Official Cahaya Map Preview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Senua Returns to PlayStation' Overview Trailer for Senua' Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced, an upcoming version of the third-person action-adventure game developed by Ninja Theory. 

Players will experience a new journey with Senua for the first time on PlayStation 5 with optimizations for PlayStation 5 Pro. Join the game's Technical Director on the process of bringing Senua' Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced to PS5 with specific features and improvements. Senua' Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced is launching on August 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), with the game being available now for Xbox Series X|S and PC.

#IGN #Hellblade2 #PlayStation
title: Senua' Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced - Official 'Senua Returns to PlayStation' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Endless Legend 2 in this new trailer for the upcoming turn-based 4X strategy game. 

The new Endless Legend 2 trailer shows gameplay and the vibrant fantasy world. Endless Legend 2 will be available on PC via Steam Early Access on September 22, 2025. A demo for Endless Legend 2 is out now on Steam until August 18, 2025.

#IGN #EndlessLegend2 #StrategyGame
title: Endless Legend 2 - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Henry Halfhead in this new trailer for the upcoming quirky sandbox adventure game about an odd little character with the ability to become any object within their reach. 

Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to take Henry through their not-so-ordinary everyday life. Henry Halfhead will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on September 16, 2025.

#IGN #HalfheadHenry #IndieGames
title: Henry Halfhead - Official Release Date Trailer
